<Text: The Dziga Vertov Group
1:
--------------------
Text: Dziga Vertov Group:  Their films are defined primarily for Brechtian forms, Marxist ideology, and a lack of personal authorship.

Text: Dziga Vertov Group:  The group, named after 1920s-'30s Soviet filmmaker Dziga Vertov (1896-1954), was dissolved soon after the completion of 1972's "Letter to Jane".
